posts.raw_content:
The video cannot leave my mind. I pray, yet it replays in my mind, even when I wake up in the morning every day. 

The kind, smiling child of Christ that I once met, and had the honor of having conversations with, was brutally assassinated by a demon of Satan. 

I truly hope they take all possible security measures tomorrow at his funeral. I already know some leftist will be up to no good. 

People i haven’t seen talk about faith/Christ in forever, have made a complete 180 recently. It’s a turning point in not only America, but the world. 

God protect his funeral tomorrow, give peace and comfort to Charlie’s family, and may Charlie rest in the loving arms of Jesus for eternity. Amen
